about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an atmospheric psychological horror with a haunting VHS aesthetic. As a night-shift waitress at a secluded roadside café, serve strange patrons and feel mounting dread. Each night, the nightmare becomes more real, and someone is watching from the darkness. Can you survive?

This demo version is the prologue of the first episode of the game.
The prologue is approximately 20 minutes long

STORIES THAT ARE HAPPENING SOMEWHERE CLOSE BY

In the prologue, you play as a girl working a shift before the events of the first episode and spend her last shift at a café.

DO YOUR WORK AS A WAITRESS

As it happens, you're the only employee on the night shift. Take orders, prepare food and serve customers, and don't forget to clean up at the end of the shift.

DRIVE A CAR TO GET WHERE YOU NEED TO GO

Living in a trailer park it's not easy to get to work, good thing it was possible to get an inexpensive car.

TALK TO YOUR CUSTOMERS AND THE PEOPLE AROUND YOU

Working with people you can always hear a lot of new and interesting things, who knows what information can help at the right time.

SOMEONE'S ALREADY WATCHING YOU

It always gets scarier with the coming of darkness, it even feels like someone is looking at you from the darkness..... or it's not just a feeling.

Key Features

  • Atmospheric environment.
  • VHS film aesthetic.
  • Psychological horror.
  • Immersive experience.
  • 20 min playtime.

movies.name: True Nightmare: Roadside Cafe - Announcement Trailer

name: True Nightmare - Roadside Сafe: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB | AMD Radeon R7 360, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670 | AMD Ryzen5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660Ti 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in an atmospheric psychological horror with a haunting VHS aesthetic. As a night-shift waitress at a secluded roadside café, serve strange patrons and feel mounting dread. Each night, the nightmare becomes more real, and someone is watching from the darkness. Can you survive?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
